AboutSection.title: About Me
AboutSection.paragraph1: Student of Systems Analysis and Development, I am a technology enthusiast with a deep passion for programming and IT infrastructure. My journey in the tech field is driven by constant curiosity and the desire to transform ideas into digital solutions that make a difference.
AboutSection.paragraph2: Currently, I work as a Full Stack Development intern at CGE/RO (Controladoria Geral do Estado de Rondônia), where I am part of the Núcleo de Inovação e Prevenção à Corrupção. In this strategic position, I have the opportunity to apply technical knowledge to projects that promote transparency and modernization of the public sector, contributing directly to more efficient and ethical management.
